types.name: Query
types.description: Contains all protocol data-fetching queries

fields.name: account
fields.description: An Account by ETH address

fields.name: broadcaster
fields.description: A Broadcaster by ETH address

fields.name: coinbase
fields.description: The currently authenticated user's ETH address

fields.name: currentRound
fields.description: Gets the current round

fields.name: delegator
fields.description: A Delegator by ETH address

fields.name: job
fields.description: A Job by id

fields.name: jobs
fields.description: A list of Jobs

fields.name: me
fields.description: The currently selected account (usually set by something like MetaMask)

fields.name: transactions
fields.description: All transactions to or from an account between the given start block and end block

fields.name: transcoder
fields.description: A Transcoder by ETH address

fields.name: transcoders
fields.description: A list of Transcoders

fields.name: protocol
fields.description: The protocol as a whole

types.name: String
types.description: The `String` scalar type represents textual data, represented as UTF-8 character sequences. The String type is most often used by GraphQL to represent free-form human-readable text.

types.name: Account
types.description: A type that describes a Livepeer account

fields.name: id
fields.description: The ETH address for an account

fields.name: ethBalance
fields.description: The ETH balance for an account

fields.name: tokenBalance
fields.description: The Livepeer Token (LPTU) balance for an account

fields.name: broadcaster
fields.description: The broadcaster info for an account

fields.name: delegator
fields.description: The delegator info for an account

fields.name: transcoder
fields.description: The transcoder info for an account

types.name: Broadcaster
types.description: Submit transcode jobs for live video streams.

fields.name: id
fields.description: The broadcaster's ETH address

fields.name: deposit
fields.description: The broadcaster's ETH deposit (required to create a Job)

fields.name: withdrawBlock
fields.description: The earliest ETH block at which the broadcaster is eligible to withdraw their deposited ETH

fields.name: jobs
fields.description: The jobs created by a broadcaster

types.name: Int
types.description: The `Int` scalar type represents non-fractional signed whole numeric values. Int can represent values between -(2^31) and 2^31 - 1.

types.name: Job
types.description: A transcode job, created by a broadcaster

fields.name: id
fields.description: Unique identifer for job

fields.name: broadcaster
fields.description: Address of broadcaster that requested the transcoding job

fields.name: profiles
fields.description: Transcoding profiles associated with the job

fields.name: streamId
fields.description: Unique identifier for the stream

types.name: JobProfile
types.description: A job's transcoding profile

fields.name: id
fields.description: The hashcode for the transcoding profile

fields.name: name
fields.description: The name of the profile

fields.name: bitrate
fields.description: The profile bitrate

fields.name: framerate
fields.description: The profile framerate

fields.name: resolution
fields.description: The screen resolution of the profile

types.name: Delegator
types.description: Users that bond tokens and delegate their bonded stake to other users, usually registered transcoders in exchange for shared rewards and fees.

fields.name: id
fields.description: The ETH address of a delegator

fields.name: allowance
fields.description: The delegator's token allowance

fields.name: bondedAmount
fields.description: The amount of Livepeer Token a delegator has bonded

fields.name: fees
fields.description: The amount of fees a delegator has collected

fields.name: delegateAddress
fields.description: The ETH address of the delegate (the one whom the delegator has bonded to)

fields.name: delegatedAmount
fields.description: The amount of Livepeer Token the delegator has delegated

fields.name: lastClaimRound
fields.description: The last round that the delegator claimed reward and fee pool shares

fields.name: pendingFees
fields.description: The total amount of ETH the delegator has earned through the current round

fields.name: pendingStake
fields.description: The total amount of tokens the delegator has earned through the current round

fields.name: startRound
fields.description: The round the delegator becomes bonded and delegated to its delegate

fields.name: status
fields.description: The status of a delegator

fields.name: withdrawRound
fields.description: The round the delegator can withdraw its stake.

types.name: DelegatorStatus
types.description: The possible statuses of a delegator

types.name: Transcoder
types.description: Perform transcoding work for the network. The transcoders with the most delegated stake are elected as active transcoders that process transcode jobs for the network.

fields.name: id
fields.description: The transcoder's ETH address

fields.name: active
fields.description: Whether or not the transcoder is active

fields.name: status
fields.description: The status of the transcoder

fields.name: lastRewardRound
fields.description: Last round that the transcoder called reward

fields.name: rewardCut
fields.description: % of block reward cut paid to transcoder by a delegator

fields.name: feeShare
fields.description: % of fees paid to delegators by transcoder

fields.name: pricePerSegment
fields.description: Price per segment for a stream (LPTU)

fields.name: pendingRewardCut
fields.description: Pending block reward cut for next round if the transcoder is active

fields.name: pendingFeeShare
fields.description: Pending fee share for next round if the transcoder is active

fields.name: pendingPricePerSegment
fields.description: Pending price per segment for next round if the transcoder is active

fields.name: totalStake
fields.description: Total tokens delegated toward a transcoder (including their own)

types.name: Boolean
types.description: The `Boolean` scalar type represents `true` or `false`.

types.name: TranscoderStatus
types.description: The possible statuses of a transcoder

types.name: Round
types.description: Submit transcode jobs for live video streams.

fields.name: id
fields.description: The round number

fields.name: initialized
fields.description: Whether the round was initialized

fields.name: lastInitializedRound
fields.description: The last previously initialized round

fields.name: length
fields.description: The number of blocks this round lasts for

fields.name: startBlock
fields.description: When the round starts

types.name: Transaction
types.description: An Ethereum transaction receipt

fields.name: id
fields.description: The transaction hash

types.name: JSON
types.description: The `JSON` scalar type represents JSON values as specified by [ECMA-404](http://www.ecma-international.org/publications/files/ECMA-ST/ECMA-404.pdf).

fields.name: paused
fields.description: Protocol paused

fields.name: id
fields.description: Protocol id

types.name: Mutation
types.description: Contains all protocol transaction queries

fields.name: approve
fields.description: Approve an amount for an ERC20 token transfer

fields.name: bond
fields.description: Submits a bond transaction for a previously approved amount

fields.name: claimEarnings
fields.description: Claims earnings from your last claim round through specified round

fields.name: unbond
fields.description: Submits a bond transaction for a previously approved amount

fields.name: transactionSubmitted
fields.description: A newly submitted transaction

fields.name: transactionConfirmed
fields.description: A newly confirmed transaction

types.name: __Schema
types.description: A GraphQL Schema defines the capabilities of a GraphQL server. It exposes all available types and directives on the server, as well as the entry points for query, mutation, and subscription operations.

fields.name: types
fields.description: A list of all types supported by this server.

fields.name: queryType
fields.description: The type that query operations will be rooted at.

fields.name: mutationType
fields.description: If this server supports mutation, the type that mutation operations will be rooted at.

fields.name: subscriptionType
fields.description: If this server support subscription, the type that subscription operations will be rooted at.

fields.name: directives
fields.description: A list of all directives supported by this server.

types.name: __Type
types.description:
The fundamental unit of any GraphQL Schema is the type. There are many kinds of types in GraphQL as represented by the `__TypeKind` enum.

Depending on the kind of a type, certain fields describe information about that type. Scalar types provide no information beyond a name and description, while Enum types provide their values. Object and Interface types provide the fields they describe. Abstract types, Union and Interface, provide the Object types possible at runtime. List and NonNull types compose other types.

types.name: __TypeKind
types.description: An enum describing what kind of type a given `__Type` is.

enumValues.name: SCALAR
enumValues.description: Indicates this type is a scalar.

enumValues.name: OBJECT
enumValues.description: Indicates this type is an object. `fields` and `interfaces` are valid fields.

enumValues.name: INTERFACE
enumValues.description: Indicates this type is an interface. `fields` and `possibleTypes` are valid fields.

enumValues.name: UNION
enumValues.description: Indicates this type is a union. `possibleTypes` is a valid field.

enumValues.name: ENUM
enumValues.description: Indicates this type is an enum. `enumValues` is a valid field.

enumValues.name: INPUT_OBJECT
enumValues.description: Indicates this type is an input object. `inputFields` is a valid field.

enumValues.name: LIST
enumValues.description: Indicates this type is a list. `ofType` is a valid field.

enumValues.name: NON_NULL
enumValues.description: Indicates this type is a non-null. `ofType` is a valid field.

types.name: __Field
types.description: Object and Interface types are described by a list of Fields, each of which has a name, potentially a list of arguments, and a return type.

types.name: __InputValue
types.description: Arguments provided to Fields or Directives and the input fields of an InputObject are represented as Input Values which describe their type and optionally a default value.

fields.name: defaultValue
fields.description: A GraphQL-formatted string representing the default value for this input value.

types.name: __EnumValue
types.description: One possible value for a given Enum. Enum values are unique values, not a placeholder for a string or numeric value. However an Enum value is returned in a JSON response as a string.

types.name: __Directive
types.description:
A Directive provides a way to describe alternate runtime execution and type validation behavior in a GraphQL document.

In some cases, you need to provide options to alter GraphQL's execution behavior in ways field arguments will not suffice, such as conditionally including or skipping a field. Directives provide this by describing additional information to the executor.

types.name: __DirectiveLocation
types.description: A Directive can be adjacent to many parts of the GraphQL language, a __DirectiveLocation describes one such possible adjacencies.

enumValues.name: QUERY
enumValues.description: Location adjacent to a query operation.

enumValues.name: MUTATION
enumValues.description: Location adjacent to a mutation operation.

enumValues.name: SUBSCRIPTION
enumValues.description: Location adjacent to a subscription operation.

enumValues.name: FIELD
enumValues.description: Location adjacent to a field.

enumValues.name: FRAGMENT_DEFINITION
enumValues.description: Location adjacent to a fragment definition.

enumValues.name: FRAGMENT_SPREAD
enumValues.description: Location adjacent to a fragment spread.

enumValues.name: INLINE_FRAGMENT
enumValues.description: Location adjacent to an inline fragment.

enumValues.name: SCHEMA
enumValues.description: Location adjacent to a schema definition.

enumValues.name: SCALAR
enumValues.description: Location adjacent to a scalar definition.

enumValues.name: OBJECT
enumValues.description: Location adjacent to an object type definition.

enumValues.name: FIELD_DEFINITION
enumValues.description: Location adjacent to a field definition.

enumValues.name: ARGUMENT_DEFINITION
enumValues.description: Location adjacent to an argument definition.

enumValues.name: INTERFACE
enumValues.description: Location adjacent to an interface definition.

enumValues.name: UNION
enumValues.description: Location adjacent to a union definition.

enumValues.name: ENUM
enumValues.description: Location adjacent to an enum definition.

enumValues.name: ENUM_VALUE
enumValues.description: Location adjacent to an enum value definition.

enumValues.name: INPUT_OBJECT
enumValues.description: Location adjacent to an input object type definition.

enumValues.name: INPUT_FIELD_DEFINITION
enumValues.description: Location adjacent to an input object field definition.

directives.name: skip
directives.description: Directs the executor to skip this field or fragment when the `if` argument is true.

directives.name: include
directives.description: Directs the executor to include this field or fragment only when the `if` argument is true.

directives.name: deprecated
directives.description: Marks an element of a GraphQL schema as no longer supported.

args.name: reason
args.description: Explains why this element was deprecated, usually also including a suggestion for how to access supported similar data. Formatted in [Markdown](https://daringfireball.net/projects/markdown/).
